publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5537 Mr Frank McAveety: Scottish Rugby Celebrated at Parliament—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Rugby on its recent event on 13 January 2010 in the Scottish Parliament to highlight ongoing extensive work both on and off the pitch; notes Scottish Rugby’s efforts to boost rugby in schools and communities; welcomes new national team coach Andy Robinson, Scottish internationals Nick De Luca and Kelly Brown and other senior Scottish Rugby officials to the Parliament; congratulates the Scottish national team on its excellent performance in the autumn tests, and wishes it the best of luck for its forthcoming Six Nations campaign that kicks off at Murrayfield on 7 February against France.
S3M-5537 Scottish Rugby Celebrated at Parliament (lodged on 14 January 2010) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-5537 Scottish Rugby Celebrated at Parliament (lodged on 14 January 2010) Karen Whitefield*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-5537 Scottish Rugby Celebrated at Parliament (lodged on 14 January 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Rhoda Grant*, Jack McConnell*

S3M-5537 Scottish Rugby Celebrated at Parliament (lodged on 14 January 2010) Margaret Curran*, Stewart Maxwell*, Nigel Don*, Elaine Smith*, Pauline McNeill*, Jackie Baillie*, James Kelly*, Liam McArthur*, Elizabeth Smith*, Robin Harper*, Sandra White*, John Park*, Hugh Henry*, Bill Wilson*, Stuart McMillan*, John Wilson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Rhona Brankin*, Jamie McGrigor*, Kenneth Gibson*, Trish Godman*, Bob Doris*, Andy Kerr*, Ken Macintosh*, Nanette Milne*, Ross Finnie*, David Whitton*, Mike Pringle*, Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-5537 Scottish Rugby Celebrated at Parliament (lodged on 14 January 2010) Elaine Murray*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-5537 Scottish Rugby Celebrated at Parliament (lodged on 14 January 2010) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-5537 Scottish Rugby Celebrated at Parliament (lodged on 14 January 2010) Gil Paterson*
